item.title: ‘Black Myth: Wukong’ Sequel ‘Zhongkui’ Set From Developer Game Science
item.description: A sequel to Game Science’s hit video game “Black Myth: Wukong,” titled “Black Myth: Zhongkui,” was revealed during the Opening Night Live presentation at Gamescom 2025 on
